TopicTitle: Nyan Cat On the loading screen

Articles.Content:
I started ksp on 64x bit and something like this happened:

My KSP is modded:

I don't know why did this happened, so i asked for support.

Notice the date. I came here looking for an answer to the same question, and when I saw the date on your post it clicked. I'm pretty sure it's a modulemanager joke for April fools. Could be squad but I don't think so

It is for modulemanger and is not an april fools joke. It has been there for over a year now if you try and run it on the 64 bit version of the game. Sarbian did this to let people know it was unstable in 64 bit. If you use the latest module manger he just released for 1.1 the cat isn't there anymore on 64 bit.

15 minutes ago, raidernick said:

It is for modulemanger and is not an april fools joke. It has been there for over a year now if you try and run it on the 64 bit version of the game. Sarbian did this to let people know it was unstable in 64 bit. If you use the latest module manger he just released for 1.1 the cat isn't there anymore on 64 bit.

The cat on the 32bit version of the game is an april fools joke and the thread of the discussion about it is here:
